problem.markdown:
>>Which stage of survey development typically takes the longest amount of time?<<
( ) Deciding whether to use a survey in your course (x) Planning and design ( ) Build ( ) Testing once built
[explanation] Planning and writing your survey should take the longest amount of time. If it takes you longer to build and test it than it did to plan it, you probably missed something in your planning step. [explanation]
